title: Concert of acts; effect on jurisdiction
context: ยง380-5 Concert of acts; effect on jurisdiction. No court of the State shall have jurisdiction to issue a restraining order or temporary or permanent injunction upon the ground that any of the persons participating or interested in a labor dispute constitute or are engaged in an unlawful combination or conspiracy because of the doing in concert of the acts enumerated in section 380-4. [L 1963, c 200, ยง5; Supp, ยง90B-5; HRS ยง380-5]
